scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a halo and wearing a blue robe adorned with gold stars, is seated on a red cushion. She holds the Christ Child, who is naked and also has a halo. To the left, an angel with white wings and a white robe kneels, with hands clasped in prayer. To the right, another angel, also with white wings, wears a red robe and plays a violin. The background is a patterned tapestry of red, blue, and gold squares, framed by an arched architectural element. The figures are set against a green ground with decorative yellow foliage. The scene is bordered by decorative elements typical of a manuscript illumination.
